LightningComponentBundle.description: Import a CSV file to create records in Salesforce

property.name: parentFieldReference
property.label: Parent Field
property.description: Set the API name of the field that identifies the parent record that you want to set for the imported records (ex. AccountId or Opportunity__c).

property.name: objectToCreate
property.label: Object to Create
property.description: Specify the API name of the object that you want to create records of.

property.name: mappingMetadataObject
property.label: Mapping Metadata Object
property.description: Set the API name of the custom metadata object that holds the mappings for the import.

property.name: maxRecords
property.label: Max Records
property.description: Set the max number of records that you want to allow imported.
